name: @jh3y/whirl
description: CSS loading animations with minimal effort
author: jh3y <jhey.dev>

scripts.publish-package: export FOR_PACKAGE=true && mkdir -pv css && cp -rf src/whirls sass && node utils/publish
scripts.publish-css: export FOR_PACKAGE=false && mkdir -pv dist/css && cp -rf src/whirls dist/sass && cp README.md dist/README.md && node utils/publish
scripts.deploy: git tag -a v$npm_package_version -m 'whirl v$npm_package_version' && git push origin v$npm_package_version
